title: Warm salad of aubergine, prosciutto, red pepper and spinach
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, trimmed and sliced', '1 red pepper, cut into rings', '50g (2 oz) spinach leaves, torn into pieces', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', 'freshly ground rock salt to taste', '1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato pur√©e', '1 slice prosciutto di Parma, thinly sliced']
